postEventExample.summary: An example of a POST request body to the ERP Klio API.
postEventExample.description: This is an example of a POST request body to the ERP Klio API. It is used to send an event to the ERP Klio API.

value.des1: SUCRE DE CANNE MI BLANC  BIO
value.des2: BIG BAG 1000 kg ou SAC 25 kg COLOMBIE

info: This OpenAPI 3.0 file regroups reusable examples.
